scripts.db:backup: PGPASSWORD=$(node -e "console.log(new URL(process.env.DATABASE_URL).password)") pg_dump -h $(node -e "console.log(new URL(process.env.DATABASE_URL).hostname)") -U $(node -e "console.log(new URL(process.env.DATABASE_URL).username)") -d $(node -e "console.log(new URL(process.env.DATABASE_URL).pathname.substring(1))") -Fc > backup.dump
scripts.db:restore: PGPASSWORD=$(node -e "console.log(new URL(process.env.DATABASE_URL).password)") pg_restore -h $(node -e "console.log(new URL(process.env.DATABASE_URL).hostname)") -U $(node -e "console.log(new URL(process.env.DATABASE_URL).username)") -d $(node -e "console.log(new URL(process.env.DATABASE_URL).pathname.substring(1))") -Fc < backup.dump
